live_updates: Technicians are on stand-by for remaining areas that are still not getting power. We thank you for your patience during this outage.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50317.summary: Some customers in the Pines area of Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50317.title: June 5 – Red Deer (Pines) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50306.summary: Some customers in the Northeast Crescent Heights area of Lethbridge are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50306.title: Jun 5 - Lethbridge (Northeast Crescent Heights) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
